details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.12 Implementation limits - Real (max)
details.description: A conforming file shall not contain any real number outside the range of +/-3.403 x 10^38

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain any real number outside the range of +/-3.403 x 10^38
